lyrics:
"Car Smell" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Car Smell" (with PeeWee Longway feat. Rich Homie Quan) [Verse 1:] Hey if I'm flying down 20 Then it's purple what I use 4 till I drive it then I throw that bitch a coupe Throw stupid car alarm I know every spot to do it Ain't no talking in my car Bitch that's what that new is For that kush smell, you would stop Thank the cop, handicapped Now a nigga my roofie gone Sister got me picky 'cause I'm 4 how I used to roll Chevy black and white like the I love Lucy Throw me up out the way I think I brought the 40 way Get uncle said Jay 'cause it take all my money Partner frontin, grinding in that phantom on black In that 5 50 K with the camera in the back of the benz baby [Hook:] Here baby Not a lesson, poppin' out your free baby It's quite impressive I point it out of my rims baby now I'm flexin Talk the whole of in those heels baby Now she naked She wanna fuck me 'cause she love the way my car smells She wanna fuck me 'cause she love the way my car smells Night over night but I earn my stripe feel like Garfield She wanna fuck me 'cause she love the way my car smells [Verse 2:] Crystal Lewis my shoes 4 neons on the coupe Your bitch make a bootie boo She scan this, I scan this Can suck and fuck me in the coupe These countdowns ain't count start I made that kind of move My satellite get not allowed Had to tell the bitch be cool You know you're free my boo You love to love and you love the smell Got the hundred band in the coupe 500 a pound said muff for real Got dope for sell for the puff And this shit I do ain't new to me I got alot bitch I'm a stu I barge and I drop it at her shoe Fetch it, bitch tell me what to do Part I drone feel alone, Bank account got semi on Gotta keep my eyes on yo Your bitch weaving don't swerv it [Hook:] Here baby Not a lesson, poppin' out your free baby It's quite impressive I point it out of my rims baby now I'm flexin Talk the whole of in those heels baby Now she naked She wanna fuck me 'cause she love the way my car smells She wanna fuck me 'cause she love the way my
